data.text: An excellent well-appointed resort with plentiful facilities, a large and comfortable bedroom and stand-out staff able to cater to our needs. Wonderful value considering the all-inclusivity of the catering, the multiple swimming pools and Jacuzzis, access to the adjacent family-orientated arm of the Cleopatra complex and attentive service throughout our stay. The bedrooms and bathrooms are large and contemporary, and the atmosphere is relaxed on account of it being open to adults-only. Staff deserve particular praise for being friendly, welcoming, accommodating and upbeat at all times. Visiting in early March meant it wasn't too busy, but since it's not as large as other nearby resorts, it never felt eerie and was never too noisy either - combined with the excellent weather throughout, it is a resort I recommend for couples.
data.title: Excellent service, contemporary accommodation

data.text:
This place surpassed our expectations hugely ! The resort is immaculate, the gardens beautiful, the infinity pool wonderful . The staff are amazing and we would like to thank , Khalid for food service, Mo for bar service at pool, Ibrahim for our room and Oscar for making us laugh . 
Although the rooms are a little dated they are fine , plenty space and always kept clean and stocked with toiletries and water , we were in room 1107 and although a little noisey for the two hours of the entertainment in the evenings it was quiet by 11 pm and Ibrahim always made sure our room was cleaned and serviced each day .
The food in the market place was generally good with plenty of choice and the freshly made omelettes were particularly good for breakfast Khalid was siesta in hand to make sure we had everything we needed.
The food in the Italian restaurant was outstanding and I recommend you use your free passes for there !
The infinity pool is stunning and there was always plenty of space and beds and drinks are kept flowing by the amazing Mo !
Although we were worried about being pestered by the people around the pool selling their services and trips etc it became very apparent that if you were just honest , clear  and polite and said you weren’t interested they understood , however we did have such a good time chatting with a couple of them particularly Oscar from the on site beauty salon , he is such a lovely, happy, friendly guy and we laughed with him many times and although we didn’t take up the use of the beauty salon many people did ! The other guy was a self proclaimed George Clooney look alike who offered quad biking, camel riding trips etc .. he was hysterical and we chatted most days .. again without making us feel uncomfortable for not using his services.
To sum up .. this hotel is safe, clean, great facilities, generally good food but absolutely excellent service from all the staff.
data.title: Wonderful  place and people .

data.text:
Can honestly say this was the most amazing holiday. 

Our son has allergies, Farid the head chef was absolutely amazing in making sure our son had enough food to choose from. He made our son his own pancakes every morning & anything else that he wanted. 

Loka & Oscar from the spa are the best guys! Nothing was too much & they made sure we had the best experiences. 

We will definitely be returning to Cleopatra!
data.title: So relaxing, beautiful surroundings & amazing staff.

data.text:
Room amazing -spacious - super clean - Antonio upgrades it to a second home. 
The best chefs - delicious food for eyes and taste, helping you while having allergies. 
Honey is always there to help you with sunbeds and umbrella, greeting your morning with a honey smile.
The waiters can read your mind before even you know what drink to order. You never stay thirsty - cocktails delicious.
Pool bar offers super delicious food and a warm-hearted service.
Ahmed on the beach helping you with your towels and watching you while snorkeling for your safety. Reception accommodating in every way.
Spa - book with Ascar a facial treatment and you will feel much younger 🤩
To put it in a nutshell - it’s a super clean awesome friendly hotel -  you feel home and welcomed 🫶
data.title: Awesome - second home - gonna be back as soon as possible ❤️(stayed adults only side and used the beach front too)

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.
Sincerely
owner_response.author: Front Office Manager

data.text:
We’ve just came back from our holiday at Cleopatra. I feel this review is absolutely deserved. The main stars come from the staff who are absolutely exceptional. Shout out to the life guard Mohamed who always made sure we had the correct amount of sun or shade plus so much banter. To Oscar and Eslam from the spa, both so kind and generous and went out their way and beyond expectations. Big shout out to the bar man at the swim up bar who never ever let our drinks run dry and always remembered our orders and entertained our daughter. Thanks Sameh and Elsayed. Our rooms were always so well maintained, we had daily towel set when we came back from the pool. 

The complex in general was 1st class, the beach and snorkelling was amazing and lots of other activities to do, We have seen various comments about the food, my only advise is to remind anyone who is going that this is Egypt and now Dubai or somewhere like that. This is absolutely 5* for Egypt but don’t think it will match up to 5* in other more affluent parts of the world.
data.title: The staff make this place so special

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.
Sincerely
